about.details:
Incorporated in 1988, Micropro is an IT service company engaged in the business of Software Development, Data Processing, and Software Training. The company's tech team comprises more than 150 professionals. The company serves over 4000 customers catering to countries like India, USA, UAE and Africa. The company also provides software solutions for the government sector, PSU's and corporate clients. Micropro is an ISO 90001:2015 company which designs software solutions across various industry verticals. 

The company provides following services such as:-

  • IT Infrastructure Management Services.
  • Server Management.
  • Virtualization Services.
  • Storage and Backup Management.
  • Network Management.
  • Security Management.
  • Database Management.
  • Middleware Administration.
  • Data Centre Operations Management.

faqs.question: What is the Micropro Software Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Micropro Software Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 3790400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹81 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on November 3, 2023, and closes on November 7, 2023.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Micropro Software Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Micropro Software Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Micropro Software Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Micropro Software Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Micropro Software Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Micropro Software Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Micropro Software Solutions IPO opens on November 3, 2023 and closes on November 7, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Micropro Software Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Micropro Software Solutions IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,29,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Micropro Software Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Micropro Software Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Micropro Software Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Micropro Software Solutions IPO will be done on Thursday, November 9, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, November 10, 2023. Check the Micropro Software Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Micropro Software Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Micropro Software Solutions IPO listing date is on Friday, November 10, 2023.
